data.title: Bad Timing: A Sensual Obsession

data.text:
Nicolas Roeg (director)

Art Garfunkel, Theresa Russell, Harvey Keitel (starring)

Yale Udoff (screenwriter)

N.p. N.p., Circa 1980. Two vintage borderless reference photographs from the 1980 film, including one matte-finish and one glossy, both showing actors Art Garfunkel and Theresa Russell. One with a provenance stamp on the verso.

A psychiatrist begins a passionate affair with a married woman, with their relationship eventually devolving into violence and animosity. A controversial film, and the subject of endless disagreement between those who praise its frankness and malaise and those who find it utterly tastelessâ€”in our estimation, among Nicholas Roeg's finest directorial efforts.

Set and shot on location in Vienna.

10 x 8 inches. Near Fine, one with an annotation noting Garfunkel's name on the bottom margin of the recto.

[Book #162548]
